David James Recruitment is a leader in IT recruitment, with directors who have a long track record and great success in our field. description:
The Role
The QA Engineer is an advocate for a whole-team approach to quality. They will embed within the development teams to define and execute appropriate strategies which support the functional and non-funtional quality of the Seek Asia mobile apps. This is an individual contributor who will collaborate with the team to build, enhance and execute automated tests. They will perfom manual and exploratory testing as required and will help drive quality engineering within the team.
Key responsibilities include:
Owning the test strategies for Seek Asia mobile apps.
Evolving these test strategies to help continuously improve the Seek Asia mobile apps.
Advocating for a quality first approach.
Ensuring systems are fit for purpose, well architected and follow current SEEK development practices.
Maintaining platform health ensuring that our systems are secure, reliable, resilient, and cost effective.
Driving best practice functional testing techniques.
Working closely with an agile development teams to build, enhance and execute automated tests.
Share operational support duties.
So, what we are looking for?
Test-driven development and agile software delivery methods. A familiarity with evolutionary architecture is an asset
An understanding of the common problems in software testing and the ability to offer better solutions.
Applies relevant technologies knowledge to the development and improvement of software applications, being able to drive better technical decision at the team level.

About the company




At VYOND, our mission is to put the power of video in the hands of everyone. Vyond allows people of all skill levels in all industries and job roles to create dynamic and powerful media. With features that go beyond moving text and images, you can build character-driven stories or compelling data visualizations that engage audiences and deliver results.

Founded as GoAnimate in 2007, Vyond has helped Global 2000 organizations, small businesses, and individuals produce more than 30 million videos.

With offices in Silicon Valley, Hong Kong, and Taiwan, Vyond employs a team of people whose creativity extends well beyond our office walls. We are passionate about the power of video and how it makes the static dynamic and transforms the mundane into the captivating.

About the role:

You are a Software Engineer in nature. A career as a Software Development Engineer in Test (SDET) is your preferred, but not the second-choice.




As a hands-on Senior SDET at Vyond, you will make real impact, and be the key player by working closely with the Development team, QA team as well as the DevOps team to ensure the continuous quality of the codes throughout the whole software development life cycle. As a role model, you will be the expert in the team to inspire the developers to implement tests and write high quality scripts. 




You will be responsible for:




Driving and implementing the automation testing strategy to support the company initiatives and roadmaps.

Owning and directly contributing to the improvement of quality, as well as the coverage of tests.

Building up and maintaining the test frameworks which enables developers to write reliable and better tests.

Working closely with the DevOps team to improve the CI/CD flow for achieving faster and reliable releases.




If you are passionate about technology, detail-oriented and obsessed with quality, this will be the perfect stage for you to demonstrate your skills and utilize your experience.




 Basic Requirements:




Bachelor degree or above in Computer Science, or equivalent working experience. 

Minimum 3 years of trackable and proven experience in designing and implementing automation frameworks for large or enterprise scale applications.

Solid experience with SaaS, and cloud platforms like AWS / Azure / GCP.

Knowledge of at least one OOP language (e.g. Java or C++). 

Familiarity with the software engineering methodologies and practices.

Able to work independently; A team player, self-motivated and well organised. 

Excellent communication skills. Able to work with people from different teams, with technical or non-technical backgrounds. 

Good command of English, both written and spoken. 





 Preferred Requirements:

Full stack understanding of web application systems, from user input to data persistence.

Experience in implementing or developing test suites for complex cloud applications with large scale and high availability.

Knowledge of Node.js or Python.

Previous leadership experience is a plus.
